name: capacity-team-planner
description: Capacity Team Planner - Planowanie pojemności zespołu z Jira i Tempo

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.heroku-postbuild: echo '=== Heroku Postbuild ===' && if [ -d frontend ]; then cd frontend && npm ci --only=production=false && NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false INLINE_RUNTIME_CHUNK=false npm run build && echo 'Build completed'; else echo 'Frontend dir not found'; fi
